c74object.name: dynamic.in~
c74object.digest: The functionality of in~ within dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~
c74object.description: dynamic.in~ acts like in~ but for patchers loaded inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ object. Unlike in~ the user can change the signal inlet which the object refers to by sending an int to the object.

objarg.name: initial-inlet
objarg.description:
Set the inial inlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.
Default is 0 (off).

method.name: inlet
method.description: Sending an int to the first inlet sets the inlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Outputs the input from the correspoding inlet of the dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ that dynamic.in~ is inside.
